Package org.example.declarations

Class Account

java.lang.Object
org.example.declarations.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subscriber
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreditAccount, DebitAccount, DepositAccount
public abstract class Account extends Object implements Subscriber
Declaration API for bank accounts and implementation general methods
